alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued March 06 at 6:56AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A High Surf Advisory is in effect... WHAT...High Surfs of 8 to 10 feet WHERE...North shores of all islands of American Samoa WHEN...Through Friday IMPACTS...Large breaking waves, dangerous rip currents, and localized beach erosion Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 655 TAEAO ASO GAFUA MATI 6 2023 ...Ua iai nei le Fautuaga mo Galu maualuluga... MAFUAAGA...Galu maualuluga e 8 i le 10 futu NOFOAGA...Talafatai i matu o motu uma a Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Faraile AAFIAGA...E maualuluga galu, aave le sami, ma solo matafaga. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo galu maualuluga e faailoa mai ai le malolosi ma le tetele o galu o le a aafia ai gataifale ma matafaga, ma o le a malolosi aave o le sami e ono solo ai nisi o vaega o le matafaga. Ona o le siisii o peau o le sami, e fautuaina ai le mamalu lautele ma le au fai faiva ina ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga ona o le maualuluga o galu ua iai nei.
info.instruction: A high surf advisory indicates large breaking waves will affect beaches in the advisory area, producing dangerous rip currents and localized beach erosion. Also, it is extremely dangerous to fish or observe waves from rocks during high surf conditions. Unwary beach walkers can be caught off guard as waves suddenly race farther up the beach than normal.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
